actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE bank_list SET
		name_of_bank = '{{update_form.fieldState.name_of_bank.isVisible ? update_form.formData.name_of_bank : update_form.sourceData.name_of_bank}}',
		img_url = '{{update_form.fieldState.img_url.isVisible ? update_form.formData.img_url : update_form.sourceData.img_url}}',
    created_date = '{{update_form.fieldState.created_date.isVisible ? update_form.formData.created_date : update_form.sourceData.created_date}}',
		updated_date = '{{update_form.fieldState.updated_date.isVisible ? update_form.formData.updated_date : update_form.sourceData.updated_date}}',
		cashfree_netbanking_code = '{{update_form.fieldState.cashfree_netbanking_code.isVisible ? update_form.formData.cashfree_netbanking_code : update_form.sourceData.cashfree_netbanking_code}}',
		cashfree_debitcard_code = '{{update_form.fieldState.cashfree_debitcard_code.isVisible ? update_form.formData.cashfree_debitcard_code : update_form.sourceData.cashfree_debitcard_code}}',
		code = '{{update_form.fieldState.code.isVisible ? update_form.formData.code : update_form.sourceData.code}}'
WHERE id = {{data_table.selectedRow.id}};
